channel.title: CVE Feed for Lenovo -- ThinkPad Hybrid USB-C with USB-A Dock Firmware Update Tool
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Lenovo -- ThinkPad Hybrid USB-C with USB-A Dock Firmware Update Tool

item.title: CVE-2022-4569|2024-08-03T01:41:45.585Z -- lenovo -- thinkpad%20hybrid%20usb-c%20with%20usb-a%20dock%20firmware%20update%20tool
item.description: A local privilege escalation vulnerability in the ThinkPad Hybrid USB-C with USB-A Dock Firmware Update Tool could allow an attacker with local access to execute code with elevated privileges during the package upgrade or installation.
